QuestData.Title: Blackhand's Crucible: Blackhand
QuestData.Description: Ol' Grommash cannot rule the Iron Horde without his Warlords keeping the clans in line. Let's deal 'em a blow that they can't recover from! Blackhand, Warlord of the Blackrock clan, is a dauntless warrior and ruthless tyrant. He's second only to Grommash within the Iron Horde and oversees operations in the Foundry from atop its Crucible.$b$bTravel to the Blackrock Foundry and defeat Blackhand.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat Blackhand in the Blackrock Foundry.
